mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DELIVERY (DELIVERY_SEQ, USER_SEQ, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_PHONE, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, DETADDR, EXTADDR, DELIVERY_NUM) VALUES(SQ_DELIVERY.NEXTVAL, #{user_seq}, #{delivery_name}, #{delivery_phone}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detaddr}, #{extaddr}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT D.DELIVERY_SEQ, D.USER_SEQ, D.DELIVERY_NAME, D.DELIVERY_PHONE, D.POSTCODE, D.ADDRESS, D.DETADDR, D.EXTADDR, D.DELIVERY_NUM FROM TB_DELIVERY D LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON D.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ WHERE D.USER_SEQ = #{user_seq} ORDER BY D.DELIVERY_SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
